General.Name: Shanghai Hollywave Electronic System Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai Hollywave Electronic System Co., Ltd. develops and sells phased array calibration test systems, software, and related products. It offers phased array calibration measurements, including planar near-field measurement systems, multi-probe planar near-field measurement systems, cylindrical near-field measurement systems, spherical near-field measurement systems, multi-probe spherical near-field measurement systems, indoor far field measurement systems, outdoor far field measurement systems, compact field measurement systems, and integrated compact field measurement systems; electromagnetic stealth measurement systems; intelligent measurement systems; spaceborne equipment measurement systems; antenna products; scanning frame products; and array antenna products. The company also provides 3D electromagnetic simulation software, a domestic independent full-wave electromagnetic simulation platform; phased array design optimization software; and complex electromagnetic environment simulation software, a deterministic channel modeling and simulation software. Its products have applications in the fields of defense and aerospace, high tech, ships and oceans, automobiles and transportation, communication, and other fields and systems. Shanghai Hollywave Electronic System Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
